Installation
============

Install using pip:
------------------

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install simAIRR

Manual installation:
--------------------

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ git clone simAIRR
   (.venv) $ pip install simAIRR/


Use simAIRR through Docker:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install simAIRR
